site.description: The Devfest (i.e Developers Festival), is a technical conference destined to developers. It's meant for students, professionals, or any curious techie
site.theme: This year's theme will be Jules Verne ans his incredible universe !

tickets.name: Tickets
tickets.description: The first round of ticket sales is over, don't miss the second one on September 6th!
